tornado websocket

May 14, 2014

websocket代码：

 1 class SessionPushSocket(websocket.WebSocketHandler):
 2     
 3     def open(self, m=None):
 4         #timeout ten mins
 5         self.time_out = 10 * 60
 6         self.time_wait = 1
 7         self.loop_limit = self.time_out / self.time_wait
 8         self.loop_index = 0
 9         logging.debug("WebSocket opened:%s" % m)
10 
11 
12     def on_message(self, message):
13         logging.debug(u"You said: " + message)
14         self.register_loop(message)
15  
16 
17     def register_loop(self, guid):
18         if self.loop_index < self.loop_limit:
19             self.loop_index += 1
20             ioloop.IOLoop.instance().add_timeout(
21                 time.time() + self.time_wait,
22                 lambda: self.get_data(guid=guid, callback=self.push)
23             )
24         else:
25             #release time out connection
26             try:
27                 self.close()
28             except Exception, e:
29                 logging.debug(e)
30 
31 
32     def get_data(self, key, callback):
33         if self.ws_connection and self.ws_connection.stream.closed():
34             logging.debug("%s:close" % guid)
35             return
36 
37         #get data from store
38         data = get_from_store(key)
39         logging.debug("data:%s" % phone)
40         if data:
41             callback(data)
42         else:
43             #next loop
44             self.register_loop(guid)
45 
46     def push(self, message):
47         self.write_message(message)
48 
49     def on_close(self):
50         logging.debug("WebSocket closed")

nginx配置

nginx 需要新版本 1.4 以上

 1 http {
 2     ...
 3     map $http_upgrade $connection_upgrade {
 4         default upgrade;
 5         ''      close;
 6     }
 7 
 8     server {
 9         ...
10 
11         location /chat/ {
12             proxy_pass http://backend;
13             proxy_http_version 1.1;
14             proxy_set_header Upgrade $http_upgrade;
15             proxy_set_header Connection $connection_upgrade;
16         }
17     }
18 }
